Nithin Kamath shared a post: I have a vested interest in saying this being part of Zerodha Fund House
😬 , but it's a no-brainer to use low-cost index funds for your core portfolio. You can complement that with other funds, but the core should be passive funds.

The data shows it's getting increasingly harder for active funds to outperform their benchmarks.

Link in the comments.
